block.p: DUBIN-Frank. Beloved husband of Rosine. Father of Susan and Abraham Blank, Carol and Charles Kessler, Jack Hayon, and Fortunee Guarino. Grandfather of Esther and Jon, Miriam, Bradley, Michelle, Juline, Gabriel, Rachel, Benjamin, and Solomon. Greatgrandfather of Joshua. Services Wednesday, June 21, 2000, at 1pm, Schwartz Bros.-Jeffer Memorial Chapels, 114-03 Queens Blvd., Forest Hills, NY, corner 76th Road.
